nasal septoplasty.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

bilateral submucous resection of the inf.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

tonsillectomy and resection of soft pala.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

nasal septal deviation.context: Nasal septal deviation with bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy.

bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy.context: Nasal septal deviation with bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy.

edema to the uvula and soft palate.context: Edema to the uvula and soft palate.

1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: The right and left nasal septal mucosa and right and left inferior turbinates were anesthetized with 1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine using approximately 10 mL.

Afrin-soaked pledgets.context: Afrin-soaked pledgets were placed in the nasal cavity bilaterally.

pHisoHex.context: The face was prepped with pHisoHex and draped in a sterile fashion.

hemitransfixion incision.context: A hemitransfixion incision was performed on the left with a #15 blade and submucoperichondrial and mucoperiosteal flap was raised with the Cottle elevator.

submucoperichondrial and mucoperiosteal.context: A hemitransfixion incision was performed on the left with a #15 blade and submucoperichondrial and mucoperiosteal flap was raised with the Cottle elevator.

Cottle elevator.context: A hemitransfixion incision was performed on the left with a #15 blade and submucoperichondrial and mucoperiosteal flap was raised with the Cottle elevator.

Takahashi forceps.context: The deviated portion of the nasal septal cartilage and bone was removed with a Takahashi forceps, and a large inferior septal spur was removed with a V-chisel.

V-chisel.context: The deviated portion of the nasal septal cartilage and bone was removed with a Takahashi forceps, and a large inferior septal spur was removed with a V-chisel.

4-0 Vicryl.context: The hemitransfixion incision was closed with a 4-0 Vicryl in an interrupted fashion.

straight and curved turbinate scissors.context: The right and left inferior turbinates were trimmed in a submucous fashion using straight and curved turbinate scissors under direct visualization with a 4 mm 0 degree Storz endoscope.

4 mm 0 degree Storz endoscope.context: The right and left inferior turbinates were trimmed in a submucous fashion using straight and curved turbinate scissors under direct visualization with a 4 mm 0 degree Storz endoscope.

suction electrocautery.context: Hemostasis was acquired by using suction electrocautery.

bacitracin ointment.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

Doyle splints.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

3-0 nylon suture.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

McIvor mouth gag.context: A McIvor mouth gag was applied.

Bovie electrocautery.context: The left tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis forceps, retracted medially, and the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with Bovie electrocautery.

curved Allis forceps.context: The left tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis forceps, retracted medially, and the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with Bovie electrocautery.

right angle clamp.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.

right angle scissor.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.

3-0 Vicryl.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.

saline irrigation.context: Copious saline irrigation of the oral cavity was then performed.

estimated blood loss.context: The estimated blood loss was less than 10 mL.

38-year-old male.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

nasal obstruction.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

tonsillolith.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

halitosis.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

choking.context: He also has developed tremendous edema to his posterior palate and uvula, which is causing choking.
